====Usage notes====
* {{qualifier|Min Nan}} ''tùi-put-chū'' is not used as an interjection meaning "I'm sorry" in Min Nan. Use {{zh-l|歹勢|[[phái-sè]]}} or {{zh-l|失禮|[[sit-lé]]}} instead.
